summary: The formation of the Department of Homeland Security required incorporating 22 agencies—some with major management challenges—into one department. This transformation has long been a topic on our High Risk List although we have noted significant progress and narrowed our focus to strengthening DHS management. This testimony addresses DHS's progress and the remaining actions needed to be removed from the list. DHS has met 3 of...
title: Department of Homeland Security: Progress Made Strengthening Management Functions, but Work Remains
